channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Melinda French Gates said Warren Buffett’s advice helped her set boundaries as a leader
item.description: Buffett told staffers at the Gates Foundation to “find your bull's-eye” and everything else will fall into place.

item.title: Where to invest as the Trump’s tariffs push the world away from the U.S.
Intel’s stock has set its sights on its best session in five years
AI models take on EQ, the Iowa Writers’ Workshop, and mountain climbing
item.description: AI companies are increasingly encroaching on domains that go to the core of our sense of ourselves as a species.

item.title: Sonos stumbles again, reportedly scrapping its long-awaited device for streaming video
item.description: It’s the latest in a series of changes at the company.

item.title: The next C-suite pivot is from a DEI to a DOGE mindset—and leadership roles are in for a shakeup
item.description: Most current executives grew up in an economy sheltered from the most destructive forms of competition. It’s time to refocus.

item.title: An alcohol trade war has broken out, and it’s coming for your Bordeaux
LVMH is looking to hike its CEO age limit to 85, paving a path for Bernard Arnault to helm the company for another decade
item.description: The legendary 94-year-old investor Warren Buffett wrote to Arnault after LVMH raised its retirement age to 80 in 2022, saying the age limit was much t...

item.title: One sentiment survey shows investors are still bearish
